info.description: API to Create, update and manage transactions related to Accounts such as inward/outward Funds Transfers and Bulk Transfers.
info.title: Funds Transfers

post.description: Create Funds Transfer between two customer accounts with details such as Transaction Type, Amount, Date & Commission

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

put.description: Update Funds Transfer with details such as Transaction Type, Amount, Date & Commission

parameters.name: fundsTransferId
parameters.description: Identifier of the Funds Transfer

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

get.description: Retrieves list of Funds Transfer details such as Type of Transaction, Date & Amount for the specified Customer Accounts

parameters.name: debitAccountId
parameters.description: Indicates the debit account number of the payment or transaction.

parameters.name: creditAccountId
parameters.description: Credit account identifier of the payment or transaction

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

get.description: Retrieves the list of Bulk Transfer details such as Transaction Reference, Type, Currency, Amount & Accounts involved in the Transaction occurred in a day

parameters.name: bulkTransferId
parameters.description: Identifier of the Bulk Transfer

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

post.description: Create an Inward Transfer with details such as Transaction Type, Amount, Date, Commission and Ordering Bank & Customer

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

put.summary: Update Funds Transfer details for a Inward Transfer
put.description: Update an Inward Transfer with details such as Transaction Type, Amount, Date, Commission and Ordering Bank & Customer

parameters.name: fundsTransferId
parameters.description: Identifier of the Funds Transfer

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

get.description: Retrieves the list of Inward Transfer details such as Transaction Reference, Type, Currency, Amount, Ordering Bank & Customer and Accounts involved in the Transaction

parameters.name: debitAccountId
parameters.description: Indicates the debit account number of the payment or transaction.

parameters.name: creditAccountId
parameters.description: Credit account identifier of the payment or transaction

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

post.description: Create an Outward Transfer with details such Transaction Type, Amount, Date, Commission and Beneficiary

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

put.summary: Update Funds Transfer details for a Outward Transfer
put.description: Update an Outward Transfer with details such as Transaction Type, Amount, Date, Commission and Beneficiary

parameters.name: fundsTransferId
parameters.description: Identifier of the Funds Transfer

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

get.description: Retrieves the list of Outward Transfer details such as Transaction Reference, Type, Currency, Amount, and Beneficiary and Accounts involved in the Transaction

parameters.name: debitAccountId
parameters.description: Indicates the debit account number of the payment or transaction.

parameters.name: creditAccountId
parameters.description: Credit account identifier of the payment or transaction

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

code.description: The code related to override message.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

transactionType.description: Identifies the transaction type applicable to the transaction being processed, i.e. outward or inward payment. For example: ACPX, OTPX etc.

debitAccountId.description: Indicates the debit account number of the payment or transaction.

debitCurrency.description: Currency of the debit account. For example: USD, EUR etc.

debitAmount.description: Amount to be debited in a payment transaction

debitValueDate.description: Date on which the amount will be debited for settlement

creditAccountId.description: Credit account identifier of the payment or transaction

creditCurrencyId.description: Specifies the credit currency. For example: USD, EUR etc.

creditAmount.description: Amount to be credited in a payment transaction

creditValueDate.description: Reference quoted by the credit account for a payment

commissionCode.description: These field control the allocation of Periodic commission where the field COMM.CODE is the trigger for periodic commission and the field CSN.CODE is a system maintained field and hold the commission amount relating to the period band

commissionType.description: Identifies the Commission Types which are applicable to the transaction

commissionAmount.description: Amount of commission charged for the payment created with respect to the commission type used.

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique identifier/Message Reference of the record created.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

options.description: The usable options for the override.

The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business
